duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide hands-on technical leadership and mentorship to a team of developers, guiding them in best practices, architecture design, and code reviews to maintain high-quality software development standards.

Collaborate with product owners, project managers, and other engineering teams to define project scope, technical requirements, and milestones. Develop project plans, allocate resources, and ensure timely delivery of projects.
Participate in software development activities, including coding, debugging, and troubleshooting, to support the team in delivering solutions related to financial events and risk management.
Drive architecture and design decisions ensuring scalability, security, and maintainability.
Foster a collaborative and inclusive work environment, encouraging knowledge sharing and continuous learning within the team.
Drive skill and career growth for team members utilizing performance management tools as applicable.

education_certification.credential: Degree or above in Computer Science, Mathematics, or related fields.
